sentences.sContent: Local people have renewed their efforts to save the school.
sentences.sCn: 当地居民再一次作出努力，挽救这所学校。

sentences.sContent: ...making up for the third of their members who do not renew each year...

remMethod.val: re(重新) ＋ new(新的) → 重新开始

words.tran: 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的
更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申

trans.tranCn: 重新开始， 继续； 更新； 恢复； 延长有效期
trans.tranOther: to arrange for an agreement or official document to continue for a further period of time
